select * from T_Job (nolock) where CompanyId = 6810 and Deleted=0 and Modified >='2018-10-22 00:00:00.000'



select * from T_Application (nolock) where CompanyId = 6810 and DeletedHM=0 and JobId in ('3214903',

--Main Query
Update T_Application Set ConsentStatus = 'ACCEPTED', ConsentDate = SentDate, 
DeletionDate = DATEADD(month, 36, SentDate), Modified=GETDATE() where Id in (select Id from T_Application (nolock) where CompanyId = 6810 and DeletedHM=0 and JobId in ('3214903',
'3214904',
'3214905',
'3214906',
'3214907',
'3214908',
'3214909',
'3214910',
'3214911',
'3214912',
'3214913',
'3214914',
'3214915',
'3214916',
'3214917',
'3214918',
'3214919',
'3214920',
'3214921',
'3214922',
'3214923',
'3214924',
'3214925',
'3214926',
'3214927',
'3214928',
'3214929',
'3214930',
'3214931',
'3214932',
'3214933',
'3214934',
'3214935',
'3214936',
'3214937',
'3214938',
'3214939',
'3214940',
'3214941',
'3214942',
'3214943',
'3214944',
'3214945',
'3214946',
'3214947',
'3214948',
'3214949',

'3214951',

'3214959',

'3214981',
'3214982',
'3214983',
'3214984',
'3214985',
'3214986',
'3214987') ) and CompanyId = 6810

--Rollback query
Update T_Application Set ConsentStatus = NULL, ConsentDate = NULL, 
DeletionDate = NULL, Modified=GETDATE() where Id in (select Id from T_Application (nolock) where CompanyId = 6810 and DeletedHM=0 and JobId in ('3214903',
'3214904',
'3214905',
'3214906',
'3214907',
'3214908',
'3214909',
'3214910',
'3214911',
'3214912',
